content.question: In your response, be sure to address all parts of the question. Use complete sentences; an outline or bulleted list alone is not acceptable.Respond to parts a, b, and c.Describe one significant cultural or intellectual change during the Renaissance.Explain one cause of cultural or intellectual change during the Renaissance.Describe a significant difference between the art of the Italian Renaissance and the art of the Protestant Reformation.

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
